title: #161: Victimology in The Teacher's Pet -  #HerNameWasLynDawson
description:
The RCP team analyse the disappearance of Lyn Dawson on the 37 year anniversary that Lyn went missing. 



If you have any information about Lyn’s disappearance or the historical sex abuse at the three Sydney schools including Cromer High please contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.


#HerNameWasLynDawson

#TheTeachersPet

#CoerciveControl
